properties.name: anonymize
properties.description: If true, patient information is anonymized.

properties.name: showOverlays
properties.description: If true, overlays are shown (if present).

properties.name: rows
properties.description: The number of rows in an n-up configuration.

properties.name: columns
properties.description: The number of columns in an n-up configuration.

properties.name: windowWidth
properties.description: The brightness of the image in Houndsfield units.

properties.name: windowLevel
properties.description: The contrast of the image in Houndsfield units.

properties.name: reverse
properties.description: If true, the image is inverted.

name: DICOMOpenOptions
description: Options for opening a DICOM document.
